attributes.action: Intervene immediately to prevent the actions of some Government Ministers who are trying to undermine the independence of the Muslim Council of Britain, the UK's largest Muslim umbrella body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hazel Blears, Secretary of State for Communities is attempting to intervene in the independence of the Muslim Council of Britain (MCB) a voluntary and independent non-govermental organisation in an attempt to force the resignation of one of its senior members. This sort of government interference is totally unacceptable and without any justification and totally at odds with our western and democratic values. It is condemned by all voluntary, independent and human rights organisations. Hazel Blears Must Stop immediately or be removed by the Prime Minister. She is seriously damaging community relations.
